name: Nocturnal 4chan Theme
description: 4chin style, used with the latest version of 4chanX. Removes useless shit, makes 4chan look nice and not from the 90's! How to use: - INSTALL 4 c h a n X - IMPORT this to it (4chanx Settings > Import). - Edit the theme from your User Styles addons page, and remove the comments (/* and */ ) around line 2. - Edit the colors in :root, and scroll down to the bottom and adjust the opacity levels to hide/show things. Video preview of how it looks!
